title: Remove NSTextView extension hack
description:
Remove global NSTextView extension that overrides frame (ContentView.swift:11-18).

## Problem
Overrides frame on ALL NSTextView instances - code smell.

## Solution
Use .scrollContentBackground(.hidden) modifier (macOS 13+).
